dataset-deposit.title: Dataset Deposit
dataset-deposit.description: Register & highlight the important features of your dataset to make it more discoverable and catch the interest of other Data Space participants!

dataspace.title: Data Space
dataspace.description:
Your Dataset will be indexed by the protocol and added to a Data Space.
 Please choose the Data Space where we need to add your data.
 If you need to create a new Data Space, you can go back to the OKP4 portal.

file-picker.label: Drop your files here, or browse.
